黭字的基本解释

黭
yǎn
黑；昏暗：“类曛黄之黭漠兮。”
突然：“黭然而雷击之。”

黭字的汉语字典释义

[①]［yǎn］
［《廣韻》烏感切，上感，影。］
(1)阴黑。
(2)暗昧。参见“黭淺”。
(3)通“奄”。参见“黭然”。

黭字的康熙字典解释

【亥集下】【黑字部】　黭； 康熙笔画：21； 页码：页1521第14
【唐韻】烏感切【集韻】【韻會】【正韻】鄔感切，?音晻。【說文】果實黭黯黑也。【廣韻】黭黮。　又卒至貌。【荀子·强國篇】黭然而雷擊之。【楊倞註】黭然，卒至之貌。黭黑色，猶闇然。　又【集韻】衣檢切，音奄。又乙減切，音黯。又於錦切，音飮。義?同。

黭字的源字形

字源演变：

小篆楷体

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体日本明朝体韩国明朝体旧字形
黭字的起名意思

暂无。

Black
Basic explanation of words
Black
yǎn
Black; dim: "Similar to yellow and indifferent."
Suddenly: "Dark but lightning strikes it."
Black
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［yǎn］
["Guang Yun" Wu feels cut, upper sense, shadow. ]
(1) Darkness.
(2) Dark ambiguity. See "Xianqian".
(3) Through "奄". See "Far Ran".
Black
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Hai Ji 2] [Black Word Department] 　黭; Kangxi Strokes: 21; Page Number: Page 1521-14
[Tang Yun] Wu Gan Qi [Ji Yun] [Yun Hui] [Zheng Yun] Wu Gan Qi,? The sound is dark. [Said the text] The fruit is dark and dark. [Guang Yun] Fu.　 Died to look again. 【Xunzi·Strengthening the Country】Even though lightning strikes it. 【Yang Yiao's Note】The appearance of a dead man. It was black, still dark.　[Jiyun] The clothes are checked and cut, and the sound is dying. Yi Yi cuts down again, the sound is dark. Yu Jinqie again, the sound is delicious. Righteous? Same.

Old glyph
Black
Name meaning
Nothing.
yǎn
Iyǎn
(1) 深黑 black; dark
果实黭黯黑也。 从黑, 黭声。 --《说文》
鄙人黭浅。 --《四子讲德论》
黭日翳而罘连, 黭天开而中绝。 --唐·李华《含元殿赋》
(2) 又如: 黭幽(深黑); 黭漠(昏暗寂静)
IIyǎn
(1) 通"奄"。 忽然地 suddenly
黭然而雷击之。 --《荀子·强国》
(2) 又如: 黭然(突然)
